verifyEmailSuccess.title: Email Verified!
verifyEmailSuccess.subtitle: Your email has been successfully verified

seo.title: Email Verified Successfully

verifyEmailExpired.message: For security reasons, verification links expire after 24 hours. Please request a new verification email.

seo.description: Your email verification link has expired. Request a new link to verify your account
seo.keywords: verification expired, expired link, email verification, resend verification
